item.title: Emacs Go Mode - Revisited
item.description: A few months ago I went over how to set up Emacs for Go development. Since then, I have honestly not changed a single thing about it.

item.title: Emacs Go Mode
item.description: You will notice how much I use “me” and “I” on this post. This because your emacs configuration is extremely personal.
